profile.name: Chutipong Jarernsawat
profile.tagline: Building scalable business platforms with modern DevOps and cloud-native workflows.
profile.summary: Fullstack Developer with 5+ years of experience delivering scalable web applications and backend services using Angular, NestJS, C#, and Golang. Experienced in event-driven integration with Confluent Kafka (designing and maintaining producers/consumers across multiple topics) and building reliable delivery pipelines with GitLab CI, Docker, Jenkins, and Argo CD for GitOps-based Kubernetes deployments. Focused on performance optimization, seamless frontend-backend collaboration, and solving complex problems in agile environments.
